articles.title: Rise in acute hepatitis among kids with Covid in MP’s Sagar - India Today
articles.description: In Madhya Pradesh's Sagar, a team of medical found about 8 percent of children with Covid Acquired Hepatitis (CAH) out of 475. Hepatitis is a condition in which the liver becomes inflamed and damaged, affecting various bodily functions.
